issue.title: [Java] Cannot install arrow-memory 1.0.0 from maven central
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9647](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9647). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Seems that the jar is missing from 

<https://mvnrepository.com/artifact/org.apache.arrow/arrow-memory/1.0.0>

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9647?focusedCommentId=17171243) by Liya Fan (fan_li_ya):*
`[~mariusvniekerk]` Thank you for reporting the problem. 
In the new version, we have split arrow-memory into arrow-memory-core, arrow-memory-netty and arrow-memory-unsafe. Maybe you should search for jars for the sub-modules accordingly.
